body.p:
R R Ironworks Ky July 17th 1861
Phil Swigert Esqr
Dear Sir

I suppose there will be application made to the commission for the distribution of guns for a company that was said to be organized in Station Powell County A C Daniel Capt. & I am sorry to say a son of mine S. G Jackson 1st Lieutenant 2/3 of the Company are rank secessionist & had a secession flag waiving the day the Company was raised. the company is of the worst kind of man as to character except a few. I think they took no oath but subscribed to a paper & which they will pay no regard. I think the Certificate
of the County Judge is not according to law from what I have heard I hope they will get no arms
I do not wish to be made public

J. A. Jackson
Estill County
Recd of any 18" July 1861.
